settings.text:
Revolutionary AI Voice Recorder for Effortless
Meeting Documentation
In today's fast-paced business environment,meeting documentation has become a persistent challenge:
Manual note-taking leads to missed critical information, impacting decision quality
Post-meeting summary compilation is labor-intensive, and action items are easily forgotten
Traditional recording devices produce poor audio quality, making transcription difficult and time-consuming

Multi-language meetings create
communication barriers, leading to
inaccurate information transmission
UMEVO Note Plus AI Voice Recorder is specifically designed to address these pain points, making every meeting efficient and valuable.
Effortlessly Master Meeting Documentation in Three Steps
Magnetic AI Voice Recorder: HD Noise Reduction & Mobile AI Assistant

Compatible with Apple, Samsung, Google,
and other mainstream brands

Want to fully leverage the powerful features of UMEVO Note Plus? Follow our comprehensive setup and usage guide,

from basic configuration to advanced features, to become a meeting documentation expert.
• Download "AI DVR Link" from App Store or Google Play
• Create your app account for device management
• Long press Record button for 3 seconds until "Welcome" appears
• Open app and follow instructions to bind device
• CALL Mode: Toggle left for phone call recording
• Attach to phone back using magnetic case for calls
• Place on desk or hold in hand for meetings
• App Control: Use AI DVR Link app interface

Battery:400 mAh
Recording Time:40 hours
Standby Time:60 days
Storage:64 GB

settings.heading: What types of meetings is UMEVO Note Plus suitable for?

settings.text: Suitable for all types of business meetings, including face-to-face meetings, phone conferences, video calls, client visits, team discussions, and more. Particularly designed for professionals across 100+ industries including medical, legal, journalism, education, sales, and other sectors.

Features AI noise cancellation technology and high-fidelity microphone arrays, achieving near 99% transcription accuracy under ideal conditions. The magnetic design ensures stable device attachment, preventing recording interruptions.
Yes, supports transcription and translation for 140 languages, perfectly addressing multi-language meeting needs in international business environments.

All recording files are automatically backed up to the cloud using enterprise-grade encryption technology to protect data security. Also supports local storage with 64GB capacity for extensive meeting recordings.
40-hour continuous recording, 60-day standby time, with convenient magnetic charging design that fully meets business professionals' usage requirements.

Revolutionary AI Voice Recorder for Effortless

In today's fast-paced business environment,meeting documentation has become a persistent challenge:
Manual note-taking leads to missed critical information, impacting decision quality
Post-meeting summary compilation is labor-intensive, and action items are easily forgotten
Traditional recording devices produce poor audio quality, making transcription difficult and time-consuming
Multi-language meetings create communication barriers, leading to inaccurate information transmission
UMEVO Note Plus AI Voice Recorder is specifically designed to address these pain points, making every meeting efficient and valuable.

HD Noise Reduction & Mobile AI Assistant
Compatible with Apple, Samsung, Google, and other mainstream brands

Want to fully leverage the powerful features of UMEVO Note Plus?
Follow our comprehensive setup and usage guide, from basic configuration to advanced features, to become a meeting documentation expert.
• Download "AI DVR Link" from App Store or Google Play
• Create your app account for device management
• Long press Record button for 3 seconds until "Welcome" appears
• Open app and follow instructions to bind device

What types of meetings is UMEVO Note Plus suitable for?

Suitable for all types of business meetings, including face-to-face meetings, phone conferences, video calls, client visits, team discussions, and more. Particularly designed for professionals across 100+ industries including medical, legal, journalism, education, sales, and other sectors.

Features AI noise cancellation technology and high-fidelity microphone arrays, achieving near 99% transcription accuracy under ideal conditions. The magnetic design ensures stable device attachment, preventing recording interruptions.
Yes, supports transcription and translation for 140 languages, perfectly addressing multi-language meeting needs in international business environments.

All recording files are automatically backed up to the cloud using enterprise-grade encryption technology to protect data security. Also supports local storage with 64GB capacity for extensive meeting recordings.
40-hour continuous recording, 60-day standby time, with convenient magnetic charging design that fully meets business professionals' usage requirements.
